feed.title: Carlo Veo
feed.subtitle: This is a personal tech blog for Carlo Veo. My main interests are the Spring Framework specifically Spring Boot and Spring Cloud, Cloud Foundry, microservices architecture, Java

entry.title: My first Blog post
entry.content: Hi, Welcome to this blog. I hope you can find something useful. This is my first ever blog post. I am going to try get a post out at least once a month. My main focus of this blog will be all things web and if you go to my about page you will see what I am currently learning and what my main interests are.
